data.title: Elections of the Board of the 14th Riigikogu
data.meta_description: Elections of the Vice-Presidents of the Riigikogu on 19 July 2022 Election of the Vice-Presidents of the Riigikogu 84 members of the Riigikogu were issued a ballot paper and participated in voting. 3 ballot papers were declared invalid. The votes were divided between the candidates as follows:
data.text:
Elections of the Vice-Presidents of the Riigikogu on 19 July 2022

Election of the Vice-Presidents of the Riigikogu

84 members of the Riigikogu were issued a ballot paper and participated in voting. 3 ballot papers were declared invalid. The votes were divided between the candidates as follows:

Candidate Votes Martin Helme 35 Helir-Valdor Seeder 46

Helir-Valdor Seeder was elected the First Vice-President and Martin Helme the Second Vice-President of the Riigikogu.

Elections of the Board of the Riigikogu on 17 March 2022

Election of the President of the Riigikogu

95 members of the Riigikogu were issued a ballot paper and participated in voting. 6 ballot papers were declared invalid. The votes were divided as follows:

Candidate Votes Jüri Ratas 53 Helir-Valdor Seeder 36

Jüri Ratas was elected the President of the Riigikogu.

Election of the Vice-Presidents of the Riigikogu

88 members of the Riigikogu were issued a ballot paper and participated in voting. 4 ballot papers was declared invalid. The votes were divided between the candidates as follows:

Candidate Votes Hanno Pevkur 52 Martin Helme 32

Hanno Pevkur was elected the First Vice-President and Martin Helme the Second Vice-President of the Riigikogu.

Elections of the Board of the Riigikogu on 18 March 2021

Election of the President of the Riigikogu

98 members of the Riigikogu were issued a ballot paper and participated in voting. 15 ballot papers were declared invalid. The votes were divided as follows:

Candidate Votes Jüri Ratas 63 Henn Põlluaas 20

Jüri Ratas was elected the President of the Riigikogu.

Election of the Vice-Presidents of the Riigikogu

93 members of the Riigikogu were issued a ballot paper and participated in voting. 6 ballot papers was declared invalid. The votes were divided between the candidates as follows:

Candidate Votes Hanno Pevkur 59 Martin Helme 28

Hanno Pevkur was elected the First Vice-President and Martin Helme the Second Vice-President of the Riigikogu.

Elections of the Vice-Presidents of the Riigikogu on 8 February 2021

Election of the Vice-Presidents of the Riigikogu

100 members of the Riigikogu were issued a ballot paper and participated in voting. 0 ballot papers were declared invalid. The votes were divided between the candidates as follows:

Candidate Votes Hanno Pevkur 60 Helir-Valdor Seeder 40

Hanno Pevkur was elected the First Vice-President and Helir-Valdor Seeder the Second Vice-President of the Riigikogu.

Elections of the Board of the Riigikogu on 25 March 2020

Election of the President of the Riigikogu

93 members of the Riigikogu were issued a ballot paper and participated in voting. 2 ballot papers were declared invalid. The votes were divided as follows:

Candidate Votes Henn Põlluaas 50 Ivari Padar 41

Henn Põlluaas was elected the President of the Riigikogu.

Election of the Vice-Presidents of the Riigikogu

93 members of the Riigikogu were issued a ballot paper and participated in voting. 2 ballot papers was declared invalid. The votes were divided between the candidates as follows:

Candidate Votes Helir-Valdor Seeder 51 Siim Kallas 40

Helir-Valdor Seeder was elected the First Vice-President and Siim Kallas the Second Vice-President of the Riigikogu.

Elections of the Board of the Riigikogu on 4 April 2019

Election of the President of the Riigikogu

100 members of the Riigikogu were issued a ballot paper and participated in voting. 0 ballot papers were declared invalid. The votes were divided as follows:

Candidate Votes Henn Põlluaas 55 Sven Mikser 45

Henn Põlluaas was elected the President of the Riigikogu.

Election of the Vice-Presidents of the Riigikogu

100 members of the Riigikogu were issued a ballot paper and participated in voting. 1 ballot paper was declared invalid. The votes were divided between the candidates as follows:

Candidate Votes Helir-Valdor Seeder 55 Siim Kallas 44

Helir-Valdor Seeder was elected the First Vice-President and Siim Kallas the Second Vice-President of the Riigikogu.
